title: Prime Time Draven Skin glitch
body: So i bought the skin 2 days ago first day the Taunt Sounds of the skin the sayings he does were different from then normal skin but today the skin has no sound changes on him its like i'm using the normal skin what is that? like there is no custom skin sounds

replies.body:
Hey Camp0 - 

I'm currently hearing the proper SFX (I'm on a mirror of PBE). The SFX should sound similar to a microphone, but you're hearing base, correct? Would you happen to have a video clip?

**EDIT**: Got it! Going to try and get this fixed within the next patch or so. :)

please fix this it has been really annoying the primetime draven skin has been using the default voice lines the skin sound effects themselves still work like when you activate bloodrush it still makes the changed sound as well as throwing the axes etc the skin sounds work but the voice lines do not it just uses all the default voice lines
Yes thats correct i don't have a video but i can record one if you guys want me to .
